title: Alt-Tab League Problem
body:
I usually Alt-Tab out of a League a lot to Change Music or Answer Skype, etc. 

now I'm unable to tab out to change music or check anything while the game is running.. 

my only option is to go to setting in-game > change fullscreen to window mode, & then alt tab out to change music...then change back to Fullscreen.
(which can be frustrating to do or simply don't have time to do it while running back to lane) 

this problem started yesterday, never had an issue with it before..

Any solutions? Any help will be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Like the *Alt+Tab* simply doesn't do **anything** while in-game? Check to ensure your keyboard or computer doesn't have some sort of *gaming mode* option that disables the Windows key and *Alt+tab* when pressed or configured to do so.

Hey Targons Blade! Thanks for the reply.
Just a quick update, the problem seems to be fixed now. 
Lasted for two days, turns out it was just a problem with my computer & not the client.
Thank you for your help & time.
